comment: * Information about a route that consists of multiple other routes in a group.

methods.name: public void addRoute(RouteInfo route)
methods.comment:
* Add a route to this group. The route must not currently belong to another group.
         *
         * @param route route to add to this group

methods.name: public void addRoute(RouteInfo route, int insertAt)
methods.comment:
* Add a route to this group before the specified index.
         *
         * @param route route to add
         * @param insertAt insert the new route before this index

methods.name: public void removeRoute(RouteInfo route)
methods.comment:
* Remove a route from this group.
         *
         * @param route route to remove

methods.name: public void removeRoute(int index)
methods.comment:
* Remove the route at the specified index from this group.
         *
         * @param index index of the route to remove

methods.name: public int getRouteCount()
methods.comment: * @return The number of routes in this group

methods.name: public RouteInfo getRouteAt(int index)
methods.comment:
* Return the route in this group at the specified index
         *
         * @param index Index to fetch
         * @return The route at index

methods.name: public void setIconDrawable(Drawable icon)
methods.comment:
* Set an icon that will be used to represent this group.
         * The system may use this icon in picker UIs or similar.
         *
         * @param icon icon drawable to use to represent this group

methods.name: public void setIconResource(@DrawableRes int resId)
methods.comment:
* Set an icon that will be used to represent this group.
         * The system may use this icon in picker UIs or similar.
         *
         * @param resId Resource ID of an icon drawable to use to represent this group

methodNames: public void addRoute(RouteInfo route, int insertAt)
